name: Boilerplate Prototype
description:
Steampunk old school dungeon crawler pipe puzzler hybrid. Destroy some bots, loot their parts or chests to fix your own, and find the level exit!

CONTROLS:

WASD to move (must power the node at the bottom of your inventory)

QE to rotate robot (and the inventory items- will fix)

LEFT CLICK to move items around

RIGHT CLICK to toggle valves

SPACE to fire guns (must power left/right nodes)
